feels.name: Pleased Surprise
feels.quote: Mr. Ladislaw! What can he have to say to me?

causedBy.name: Receiving a letter from Mr. Ladislaw

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: But I can imagine what he has written to you about.

causedBy.name: Receiving a letter from Mr. Ladislaw

feels.name: Displeasure
feels.quote: But I may as well say beforehand, that I must decline the proposal it contains to pay a visit here.

causedBy.name: Receiving a letter from Mr. Ladislaw

Places.name: Library
Places.description: The room where Dorothea and Mr. Casaubon are having a conversation.
